question: So I'm nearing the end of my pregnancy and I am just feeling totally overwhelmed and not myself. I have preeclampsia and have been on bedrest till I deliver. I've had to get state assistance bc I'm not able to work and now have the stress of bills on my mind.  I can hardly fit into any of my clothes comfortably, and have a horrible head cold/cough. My fiance  is trying to be positive and supportive but I just push him away bc I don't want to burden him with what he already knows. I feel unprepared, alone, and can't stop crying. What can I do to overcome these feelings?
title: 34 1/2 weeks and depressed
